title: What is Data Science?
description: Data Science is a multidisciplinary field that uses scientific methods, processes, algorithms, and systems to extract knowledge and insights from structured and unstructured data. It is a concept to unify statistics, data analysis, and their related methods in order to understand and analyze actual phenomena with data.

memoryTricks.content: Data Science is like a detective solving mysteries with data clues.
Data Science Song: 'Data, Data, everywhere, finding patterns if you dare!'

rootNode.name: Data Science
rootNode.description: An introduction to the field of data science.
